name: Sushi Sumo
description:
Sushi Sumo

A  2 player top down fighting game where your aim is to push to opponent out of the ring while keeping your stamina high by eating sushi.

Controls
Player 1 
Move: WASD
Push: Space

Player 2

Move: Arrow Keys
Push: Right Ctrl

Project

This is game 3 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and check out my social media from the main menu or game description.

Follow the project
